referral_rules.result: Not suitable for CI except in rare cases where outcomes with amplification are very poor.
referral_rules.reason: NICE guidelines suggest at least two thresholds at 80 dB or above in both ears, for referral. See FAQs below for info on dead regions if aided outcomes are poor.

referral_rules.result: Not suitable for CI except in rare cases where outcomes with amplification are very poor. Consider BAHA if BC is suitable.
referral_rules.reason: NICE guidelines suggest at least two thresholds at 80 dB or above in both ears, for referral. See FAQs below for info on dead regions if aided outcomes are poor.

referral_rules.result: Likely suitable for CI referral. If hearing without visual cues then consider AB speech test, if not consider CI referral.
referral_rules.reason: Meets NICE criteria of at least two thresholds at 80 dB or above in both ears. Unlikely to score above 50% on an AB speech test given 2,3,4kHz thresholds are at 95 or above in both ears. However, if hearing well without visual cues, a speech test may be useful.

referral_rules.result: May be suitable for CI referral. Next step: AB speech test.
referral_rules.reason: Meets NICE criteria of at least two thresholds at 80 dB or above in both ears. However, they may be hearing speech well enough with hearing aids. Guidelines suggest using AB speech test.

referral_rules.result: May be suitable for CI referral. Next step: AB speech test.
referral_rules.reason: Meets NICE criteria of at least two thresholds at 80 dB or above in both ears, and are unlikely to be suitable for a BAHA because BC thresholds are too poor (more than one threshold at or above 55 dB in both ears). However, they may be hearing speech well enough with hearing aids. Guidelines suggest using AB speech test.

referral_rules.result: May be more suitable for BAHA. Consider testing BC at 3&4kHz for more information.
referral_rules.reason: If BC thesholds are at or above 55 dB at higher frequencies they may still be suitable for CI. If thresholds are better than this then BAHA may be more suitable.

referral_rules.ear: one ear if no values for other ear or both ears if both have values
referral_rules.result: May be suitable for CI or BAHA may be more appropriate. Next step: test BC at both 3&4kHz to assess high frequency hearing.
referral_rules.reason: If BC thesholds are at or above 55 dB at both 3&4kHz they may still be suitable for CI. If thresholds are better than this then BAHA may be more suitable.
BC thresholds are too good for CI referral (the better ear has no more than 1 threshold at or above 55 dB). BAHA more suitable than CI.
